title: Women's World Cup Soccer Kicks Off Saturday In Canada
teaser: The Women's World Cup soccer tournament begins on Saturday. This time around, the U.S. is ranked number two in the world and has a good shot at making it to the final. The U.S. women's team hasn't won since 1999. NPR gets us ready for kick off with an overview.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
